description.full: Guitar Hero®: Warriors of Rock - Shred with over 90 master tracks that span all genres of rock including songs from bands like KISS, Muse, Soundgarden, Queen, Megadeth and more - Build your army of Rock Warriors to save Rock ‘n Roll in all new Quest mode - Take your skills to the next level with Quickplay+ where each song has up to 13 new challenges - Broadcast your in-game accomplishments with Hero Feed or share it with your friends on your favorite social websites - Join the party at any time with the click of a button in Party Play - Expand your music collection by importing your favorite on-disc and downloadable content from select previous Guitar Hero® games straight into Guitar Hero®: Warriors of Rock and enjoy these songs with additional challenges in Quickplay+ *Does not apply to a limited number of songs
